attributes.action: Enrish the Armed Forces Covenant into Law
attributes.additional_details:
i am a veteran and like many others we all feel let down,

The Armed Forces Covenant is a solemn commitment between the nation and its service members, ensuring they are treated fairly and , to uphold this nation’s promise to its heroes, lets make it law!
attributes.background: We call on the UK Government to fulfill its promise to make the Armed Forces Covenant legally binding and take immediate action to address systemic failures in veterans' care.

rejection.details:
You may find this House of Commons Library briefing helpful: 

The Armed Forces Covenant and status in law
https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/research-briefings/cbp-9072/

You may wish to submit a petition outlining how you would like the current position strengthened or the legal obligations extended.
